com.googlecode.objectify.impl

Class TranslatableProperty<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.objectify.impl.TranslatableProperty<T>

  • public class TranslatableProperty<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Associates a Property with a Translator and provides a more convenient interface.

      • executeSave

        public void executeSave(java.lang.Object onPojo,
               Node node,
               boolean index,
               SaveContext ctx)
        Gets the appropriate field value from the pojo and puts it in the node with the appropriate key for this property.
        Parameters:
        onPojo - is the parent pojo which holds the property we represent
        node - is the node that corresponds to the parent pojo; we create a new node and put it in here
        index - is the default state of indexing up to this point
